title: Cup Cake
name: Cup Cake
description: Moist and fluffy cupcakes topped with our signature buttercream frosting. Available in vanilla, chocolate, and red velvet flavors.

title: Sourdough
name: Sourdough Loaf
description: Traditional artisanal sourdough bread with a crispy crust and soft, airy interior. Naturally leavened and baked fresh daily.

title: Cookies
name: Box of Cookies
description: A delightful assortment of our best-selling cookies including chocolate chip, oatmeal raisin, and double chocolate. Perfect for sharing!

title: GF Pastry
name: GF Pastry
description: Delicious gluten-free pastries that taste just as good as the real thing. Made with high-quality almond and rice flour blends.

title: Breakfast Bundle
name: Breakfast Bundle
description: Start your day right with our Breakfast Bundle. Includes 2 freshly baked Sourdough Loaves and a bag of our house blend coffee beans.

title: Party Pack
name: Party Pack
description: The ultimate party pleaser! Contains 12 of our signature cookies and 6 assorted cupcakes. Guaranteed to make everyone smile.

title: GF Starter
name: GF Starter
description: New to gluten-free? Try our starter pack featuring an assortment of our best gluten-free pastries and breads.

title: Chocolate Muffin
name: Choco Muffin
description: Rich, double chocolate muffins with chocolate chips in every bite.

title: Blueberry Scones
name: Blueberry Scone
description: Buttery scones packed with fresh blueberries and topped with a lemon glaze.

title: Rye Bread
name: Dark Rye
description: Dense and flavorful rye bread, perfect for deli sandwiches.

title: Macarons
name: Macaron Box
description: A colorful box of 6 Parisian-style macarons in assorted flavors.

title: Red Velvet Cupcake
name: Red Velvet
description: Classic red velvet cake with tangy cream cheese frosting.

title: Ciabatta
name: Ciabatta Loaf
description: Italian white bread with a crisp crust and large, airy holes.

title: Lemon Tart
name: Lemon Tart
description: Zesty lemon curd in a butter tart shell, topped with meringue.

title: Almond Biscotti
name: Biscotti Jar
description: Crunchy twice-baked almond cookies, perfect for dipping in coffee.

title: Wedding Cake
name: Mini Wedding Cake
description: A beautiful 6-inch cake designed for intimate celebrations.

title: GF Brownies
name: GF Brownie Box
description: Fudgy, rich chocolate brownies made with almond flour.

name: French Baguette
description: Classic French stick with a crunchy crust and chewy crumb.

title: Cinnamon Roll
name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Warm, gooey cinnamon roll topped with cream cheese icing.

title: Oatmeal Cookies
name: Oatmeal Raisin

title: Vanilla Bean Muffin
name: Vanilla Muffin
description: Simple and delicious vanilla muffin with real vanilla bean specks.

title: Focaccia
